skillTree.name: Sneaky
skillTree.description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!

skillTree.name: Tricksy
skillTree.description: All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.

skillTree.name: Eyes on Master
skillTree.description: Will not allow master to fall-die, will watch his back-tail on battlefield!

effects.description:
Melee defence: +3 for Queek Headtaker
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Queek Headtaker
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +12 for Queek Headtaker
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Loyal Clawpack
skillTree.description: Always at the ready-ready.

effects.description:
Bonus vs infantry: +3 for Red Guard unit
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +3% for Red Guard unit
	(Hero's army)

Bonus vs infantry: +6 for Red Guard unit
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +6% for Red Guard unit
	(Hero's army)

Bonus vs infantry: +10 for Red Guard unit
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +10% for Red Guard unit
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Un-Rat Vigour
skillTree.description: Just none ordinary giant rat.

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud - these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Bred Leader
skillTree.description: The ascension up the greasy pole of the Skaven military hierarchy starts in the brood.

skillTree.name: Paranoid Defender
skillTree.description: A lifetime spent witnessing the ramifications of others falling short of a Warlord’s expectations makes the fear of failure all-consuming.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -15%
	(enemy characters in region)

ui_effects.description: ➕ Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.name: Suspiciously Loyal
skillTree.description: "Yes-yes, it is deadly to attack mighty Warlord! Great Horned One watches over him-him!"

effects.description:
On turn start, Lords have a chance to gain 1 loyalty
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.name: Massive Rat
skillTree.description: Towering over even Queek, Ska's physical presence induces dread.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Queek's Command
skillTree.description: Warlord Queek order Ska to kill-stab, and Ska obey!

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: The War for Eight Peaks
skillTree.description: Many Greenskins and Dwarf-Things will be killed in my Warlord's name.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +4% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +4% when fighting against Dwarfs

Melee attack: +1 when fighting against Dwarfs and Greenskins
	(Hero's army)
Weapon strength: +8% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +8% when fighting against Dwarfs

Melee attack: +2 when fighting against Dwarfs and Greenskins
	(Hero's army)
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Dwarfs

Melee attack: +4 when fighting against Dwarfs and Greenskins
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Breeding Rights
skillTree.description: The greatest-best honour to be bestowed upon a loyal rat.

skillTree.name: Murdered Subordinates
skillTree.description: Many rats plot-scheme to kill master, but Ska always watches-sees.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +25
	(Hero's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(Hero's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Ratzkrieg
skillTree.description: Forward clawpack! No time for fancy-shrewd maneuvers, charge the front lines and kill-maim!

skillTree.name: Red Guard Fangleader
skillTree.description: As the Fangleader of the most elite claw-unit in Clan Mors, Ska has overcome innumerable challenges, and survived.

skillTree.name: Brutal and Ferocious
skillTree.description: With a fierceness and savagery to command even Queek's respect, Ska tears through any foe.

skillTree.name: Watch Your Back-Tail
skillTree.description: As chieftain there are many rats who are subservient and must follow your orders... and would gladly take your place at the first opportunity.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -2% for Lords and Heroes
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Gland Control
skillTree.description: Not necessary to actually be fearless, merely to appear fearless.

skillTree.name: Seasoned Rat
skillTree.description: Few rats live longer than a handful of years. To live longer suggests significant fortitude or intelligence.

skillTree.name: Familiar Ground
skillTree.description: The chieftain's scittering ground is familiar and therefore advantageous to such a clever rat.

effects.description: Melee defence: +1 when in own or friendly territory
Leadership: +1 when in own or allied territory
Melee defence: +3 when in own or friendly territory
Leadership: +3 when in own or allied territory
Melee defence: +6 when in own or friendly territory
Leadership: +6 when in own or allied territory

skillTree.name: Future Warlord
skillTree.description: Soon-soon, yes, I will be warlord of great clan! All will bow to me-me!

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Tough as Nails
skillTree.description: There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.

skillTree.name: Intimidating
skillTree.description: You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.

skillTree.name: Hero
skillTree.description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +2 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +3 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Retinue: Bard
skillTree.description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.

skillTree.name: Esteemed Combatant
skillTree.description: You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Trainer
skillTree.description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 12%

skillTree.name: Spread Public Order
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Queek's Right Paw
backgroundSkills.description: The most loyal-dutiful Ska will protect Warlord Queek from any danger.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Leadership: +5 for Red Guard unit
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Queek Headtaker
	(Hero's army)
